      <K> StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate<I1,I2> where(KeySelector<I1,K> keySelector)
      Continues a temporal Join transformation and defines a KeySelector function for the first join DataStream .
      The KeySelector function is called for each element of the first DataStream and extracts a single key value on which the DataStream is joined.
      StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate<I1,I2> where(String... fields)
      Continues a temporal join transformation.

    • Method Detail

      • where

        public StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate<I1,I2> where(int... fields)
        Continues a temporal Join transformation.
        Defines the Tuple fields of the first join DataStream that should be used as join keys.
        Note: Fields can only be selected as join keys on Tuple DataStreams.
        Parameters:
        fields - The indexes of the other Tuple fields of the first join DataStreams that should be used as keys.
        Returns:
        An incomplete Join transformation. Call StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate.equalTo(int...) to continue the Join.

      • where

        public StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate<I1,I2> where(String... fields)
        Continues a temporal join transformation.
        Defines the fields of the first join DataStream that should be used as grouping keys. Fields are the names of member fields of the underlying type of the data stream.
        Parameters:
        fields - The fields of the first join DataStream that should be used as keys.
        Returns:
        An incomplete Join transformation. Call StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate.equalTo(int...) to continue the Join.

      • where

        public <K> StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate<I1,I2> where(KeySelector<I1,K> keySelector)
        Continues a temporal Join transformation and defines a KeySelector function for the first join DataStream .
        The KeySelector function is called for each element of the first DataStream and extracts a single key value on which the DataStream is joined.
        Parameters:
        keySelector - The KeySelector function which extracts the key values from the DataStream on which it is joined.
        Returns:
        An incomplete Join transformation. Call StreamJoinOperator.JoinPredicate.equalTo(int...) to continue the Join.

        Parameters:
        length - Length of the window
        timeUnit - Unit of time
        Returns:
        The temporal operator with slide interval specified
